amendment.description: An amendment numbered 90 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit any funds from being used to expand the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
